Text:
how bout zipping em all up into a compiliation, nothing more then say 650 MB large or general sequenced numbers like 1-10, 1-50/etc..... make more sense then just downloading em one by one.
thanks for uploading though, thats always a good thing.
When I figure out how to that I will.

It's best just to put them into a folder or folders, an then torrent that folder.  Can be done easily with Azureus.  That way, if someone only needs a particular issue, he or she can download just that one.
ya good point. that would be better. there ya have it khonshu.and of course seeding is a good idea also.
OK I'll try and find some zip program.

You don't need a zip program. Just right click the folder and select "send to ... compressed folder".
-Sam
